name: Maker's Mark 101
description: It’s fully matured Maker’s Mark bottled at 101 proof, which is the way Bill Samuels, Sr. would serve his personal guests at the distillery, showing off his signature bourbon in a bit bolder presentation than the 90 proof of regular Maker’s Mark.
tastingNotes: Sweet spicy nose and a palate of spicy fruit and caramel, complimented by Maker’s Mark 101’s rich and creamy mouthfeel, and its mellow, lingering midpalate finish.

name: Maker's Mark 2020 Limited Release SE4xPR5
description: The result of two stave profiles (SE4xPR5) utilized together, this is the second-annual limited release from the Maker's Mark Wood Finishing Series.
tastingNotes: NOSE: Heavy vanilla with spiced caramel on the.</br>PALATE: Butter pecan ice cream. Vanilla with creamy butter notes, dry spice and caramelized sweetness.</br>FINISH: Long, round, and dry.

name: Maker's Mark SSW Private Select "Be Mine"
description: A unique blend of 5 Baked American Pure Oak, 2 seared French Cuvée, 2 Roasted French Mocha, 1 Toasted French Spice
